        public String objectToXml(Object obj)
                   throws JAXBException
        Returns XML representation of the object.
        Parameters:
        obj - the Java object to be serialized
        Returns:
        the XML representation of this object
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if a JAXB error occurred.

      • objectToXml

        public String objectToXml(Object obj,
                          boolean formatted)
                   throws JAXBException
        Returns XML representation of the object using the herd custom character escape handler.
        Parameters:
        obj - the Java object to be serialized
        formatted - specifies whether or not the marshalled XML data is formatted with line feeds and indentation
        Returns:
        the XML representation of this object
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if a JAXB error occurred.

      • unmarshallXmlToObject

        public <T> T unmarshallXmlToObject(Class<T> classType,
                                   String xmlString)
                            throws JAXBException
        Unmarshalls the xml into JAXB object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type.
        Parameters:
        classType - the class type of JAXB element
        xmlString - the xml string
        Returns:
        the JAXB object
        Throws:
        JAXBException - if there is an error in unmarshalling
